title: The White Guy Dies First: 13 Scary Stories of Fear and Power
description: 13 SCARY STORIES. 13 AUTHORS OF COLOR.13 TIMES WE SURVIVED THE FIRST KILL.The White Guy Dies First is a powerful and entertaining collection for YA readers featuring thirteen scary stories in which the white guy dies first.Edited by Terry J. Benton-Walker, including stories from bestselling and critically acclaimed Adiba Jaigirdar, Alexis Henderson, Chloe Gong, Faridah Àbíké-Íyímídé, H. E. Edgmon, Kalynn Bayron, Karen Strong, Kendare Blake, Lamar Giles, Mark Oshiro, Naseem Jamnia, Tiffany D. Jackson, and Terry J. Benton-Walker.
author: Terry J. Benton-Walker
